about_the_game:
About

This is a collection of five mini-games.

Include：

Weather Invader： When humans have the ability to modify the weather, you need to completely destroy the unqualified weather.
Stronghold Attack： A war between two castles, you need to use magic to destroy all the people on each other.
Guard Tank ：Driving a tank to guard the power station, the enemy will attack from all directions in waves.
Heavy Artillery： Shoot a duck with a shotgun in your hand, for a duck a shotgun is a cannon.
Space Miner： Dodge flying rocks and smash them. Get gold in the rocks.

Feature

The difficulty of the game increases dramatically as the levels increase, making it ideal for those who are more than willing to challenge themselves.

name: A100

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(r) Core (TM)2 CPU -T7200 @ 2.50 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Mobility Raedon X1600 / Nvidia GeForce 8600M GT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard

short_description: This is a collection of five mini-games. Include： Weather Invader、 Stronghold Attack、 Guard Tank 、Heavy Artillery、 Space Miner
